main.name: Anshul Chaudhary
main.description: An Innovator at Heart, a Visionary in Practice: My journey in technology is a vibrant tapestry of creativity and problem-solving, dedicated to crafting solutions that not only meet the needs of today but also pave the way for the future
main.bio1: Hello, I'm Anshul Chaudhary, a passionate and experienced software engineer with a keen interest in Machine Learning and Data Modeling. My diverse career in the tech industry spans various roles and projects, giving me a deep understanding of programming languages, database management, and algorithm design. I'm currently enhancing my skills through a Masterâ€™s degree in Software Engineering Systems at Northeastern University.
main.bio2: I have two years of industrial experience at JPMorgan Chase & Co., Where I've made significant improvements in trade management systems, achieving major gains in operational efficiency and process optimization. I am constantly seeking challenges and opportunities to apply my skills in developing innovative solutions, driven by a commitment to continuous learning and a desire to make a meaningful impact in the tech community.
main.contactmessage: Please fill the details below and I'll contact you ASAP!

education.degree: Master of Science, Software Engineering Systems
education.description: Course Work: Concepts of Object-Oriented Design, Data Science Engineering Methods
Course Work: Data Structures & Algorithms, Web Technologies, Database Management, Software Design, Data Mining, IOT

work.title: Software Engineer
description: Successfully collaborated on an Equity Trade Management project, focusing on the migration of a legacy system to a strategic platform, enhancing high-speed trade booking and significantly increasing operational efficiency by 80% through an automated Python workflow.

Spearheaded optimization of bulk booking processes with a GraphQL API, achieving a 66% reduction in execution time, and demonstrated expertise as a subject matter expert for key booking tools, contributing to resolving 30% of system booking issues.

Played a crucial role in team development and technological advancement, training new team members, debugging and re-engineering trade-syncing queries, and streamlining data capture across systems to reduce storage load and code redundancy.

publications.name: Detecting Malware, Malicious URLs and Virus Using Machine Learning and Signature Matching

activities.name: ISTE-VESIT: Student Chapter
activities.title: Chief Technical Officer
description: Led a 20-member council in organizing technical workshops and events, effectively delegating tasks and ensuring project success.
Hosted and coordinated workshops on various technical topics, attracting over 100 attendees to each event through meticulous planning and execution.
Demonstrated adaptability and problem-solving skills by overcoming challenges during events and consistently achieving high attendee satisfaction.

work.title: Softawre Development
work.description: Design and implement innovative solutions to address complex problems and improve user experiences

work.title: Data Science
work.description: Analyze large datasets to extract meaningful insights and make data-driven decisions that drive business growth and innovation

work.title: Prompt Engineering
work.description: Craft precise and context-aware prompts to elicit desired responses from AI models and optimize their performance

work.title: Data Pipline
work.description: Build and maintain robust data pipelines, ensuring the efficient and reliable collection, processing, and storage of data

work.title: Data Visualization
work.description: Create compelling and informative visual representations of data to help stakeholders gain insights & make informed decisions

work.title: API Development
work.description: Design, build, and maintain interfaces that enable seamless communication between different software systems

page-1.title: Content Management System
page-1.description: Java Spring Boot and React-based Content Management System, similar to Canvas, enabling users (professors and students) to log in, access registered courses, and allowing professors to create quizzes, while administrators have special privileges to manage users, courses, and terms.

page-1.title: Stock Close Price Prediction
page-1.description: Employed a comprehensive Machine Learning approach, involving data collection, preprocessing, feature selection, algorithm evaluation, tuning, and validation, to create a precise model for predicting stock closing prices, offering valuable insights for investment decisions

page-1.title: Malware Detection using ML
page-1.description: Developed a robust desktop application and web extension using machine learning, with Random Forest for malware detection in Windows files and Logistic Regression for assessing the security of web URLs, providing advanced cybersecurity protection

page-2.title: Customer Review Analysis
page-2.description: Sentiment analysis on British Airways customer reviews involves data scraping, data preprocessing, data visualization, and the application of transformer-based models for sentiment classification, ultimately yielding valuable insights into customer opinions and feedback

page-2.title: CNN Digit Classification
page-2.description: CNN model for digit identification using the TMNIST dataset. The model architecture includes convolutional layers for feature extraction, max-pooling layers for spatial reduction, and fully connected layers for classification. It aims to accurately classify hand-written digits (0-9)

page-2.title: Video Interview Website
page-2.description: Django websites: a company website showcasing the orgs work and a web application for recording online interviews with a SQL database. The interview application offers user authentication, interview recording, and database management features for streamlined interview processes.

page-3.title: E-commerce Website
page-3.description: E-commerce Website is a feature-rich platform built with the Laravel framework and a SQL database. It includes user authentication, a wide product catalog, category-based parts suggestions, dynamic cart updates, secure transactions, and responsive design

page-3.title: Flight Booking Pattern
page-3.description: Analyzing British Airways customer booking patterns by processing and visualizing booking data. It also includes predictive modeling to uncover insights into customer behavior and preferences, potentially improving marketing strategies and enhancing customer experiences.

page-3.title: Event Management System
page-3.description: Platform for event registration and reporting it offers user authentication and provides super admin privileges for managing departments, committees, and student bodies. The system allows faculty and selected students to register events, with a hierarchical approval process.
